name: Magneto Bots
description:
small gameplay trailer : 


When you finish stage 9 the game is over and you WIN! (no winScreen sadly)

press p at any time to open menu and select any level if you want to skip something or go fullscreen

play as two magnetic robots where your only way to move around is to break their electromagnetic field and bounce around each level.

How to play:
Use either your left mouse button or spaceBar to to break the link between your robots launcing the smaller one into the air with a bat and then release to reestablish the link.

This will send you flying and while airborne you can do a singular air dash by allowing the smaller robot to get vengance.

How do magnets even work? 
No one knows !

This game was made in it's entierty by a team of three just using JavaScript painting on the html5 canvas browser element with all home made managers, sprites  and custom entity handling.

royalty free sound effects from: 

https://www.kenney.nl/

music provided by: 

https://soundcloud.com/paternator

thank you for checking us out
